[comment]
早川先生提供のデータを処理するためにパラメータファイル

[file]
dir_dicom=U:\data\shojima\1969female\20130327-CT04
key_dicom=*.*
modeUnsignedShort=0

[marching cube]
threshold=180

[process]
filename=param_oshima.txt

[preprocess]
threshold=170
voxel expanding=1.000000
region growing=1050
voxel gaussian=0
modeSmoothing6Neighbor=1
modeCubeResolution=1

//min_value=-300
//max_value=1000
//min_value=1200
//max_value=1800

max_value=1200

[region growing]

erosionNumber=0

[masking high ct value]

[ct range]
low ct value=200
high ct value=500
[prunning length]
